1- open water taps only when you need water, and make sure you close them well when you no longer need water to decrease the money you’ll have to pay. 

 2- it’s important to install water saving equipment.

 3- make sure you regularly fix water pipes and taps that leaks water.

 4- teach your children how to use water wisely.

 5- don’t leave faucets open when you do simple tasks like washing fruits or vegetables, or complicated tasks like washing cars.
